text: "Tu es foutu" (English: "You're screwed/fucked") is a song by Italian dance singer-songwriter In-Grid. It was released in mid 2002 as the lead single from her debut album Rendez-vous. An English version of the song titled "You Promised Me" was also released in Australia, the United Kingdom, the United States, and other countries. To date, "Tu es foutu"/"You Promised Me" remains In-Grid's most successful song worldwide, topping the charts of Greece, Hungary, and Sweden and reaching the top 10 in nine other European countries and Australia. ==Song information== "Tu es foutu" describes the end of a relationship. In-Grid tells her lover that she is fed up with his empty promises and says angrily that he is "screwed"/"fucked" (the literal meaning of "tu es foutu" in French). ==Lyrics== The lyrics were written by In-Grid and Marco Soncini, who co-produced the song with Alfredo Larry Pignagnoli. The English version was also co-written by Daniela Galli (also known as Dhany) and Paul Sears. ==Remix== A Chill-Grid remix at her album Rendez-vous, the Harlem Hustlers club mix as a B-side of the "Tu es foutu" CD single and a Benny Bennasi remix. ==Chart performance== "Tu es foutu" became a significant hit for In-Grid and marked the beginning of her successful career. It peaked at number one in Greece, Hungary and Sweden. The single reached the top ten in several countries, including Austria, Germany, Netherlands, Norway, Poland and Romania. It also proved to be successful on other continents, charting inside the top ten in Australia and on the US Billboard Hot Dance Club Play and Hot Dance Singles Sales charts. ==Charts and certifications== ===Weekly charts=== {|class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" !Chart (2002–2003) !Peak position |- |- !scope="row"|Australia Dance (ARIA) |1 |- |- |- |- |- !scope="row"|Europe (Eurochart Hot 100) |23 |- |- |- |- !scope="row"|Greece (IFPI Greece) |1 |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- !scope="row"|Poland (Polish Airplay Charts) |2 |- !scope="row"|Romania (Romanian Top 100) |3 |- |- |- |- !scope="row"|UK Singles (Official Charts Company) |200 |- |- |- !scope="row"|US Hot Dance Singles Sales (Billboard) |2 |} ===Year-end charts=== {|class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text- align:center" !Chart (2002) !Position |- !scope="row"|Belgium (Ultratop 50 Flanders) |15 |- !scope="row"|Belgium (Ultratop 50 Wallonia) |82 |- !scope="row"|Netherlands (Dutch Top 40) |36 |- !scope="row"|Netherlands (Single Top 100) |22 |- !scope="row"|Sweden (Sverigetopplistan) |59 |- !scope="row"|Switzerland (Schweizer Hitparade) |65 |} {|class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" !Chart (2003) !Position |- !scope="row"|Australia (ARIA) |39 |- !scope="row"|Australia Dance (ARIA) |2 |- !scope="row"|Austria (Ö3 Austria Top 40) |26 |- !scope="row"|Germany (Official German Charts) |22 |- !scope="row"|Sweden (Sverigetopplistan) |align="center"|13 |} ===Certifications=== ==References== ==External links== * in-grid official site Category:2002 debut singles Category:2002 songs Category:French-language songs Category:In-Grid songs Category:Number-one singles in Greece Category:Number-one singles in Hungary Category:Number-one singles in Sweden Category:Songs about heartache Category:Universal Records singles
title: Tu es foutu
